official_title: To amend the Stewart B. Mckinney Homeless Assistance Act to modify the process by which unutilized and underutilized buildings and real property resulting from the closure or realignment of military installations are made available to assist the homeless.

summary.text: Amends the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act to modify the process by which real property from closed military bases is made available to the homeless.

titles.title: To amend the Stewart B. Mckinney Homeless Assistance Act to modify the process by which unutilized and underutilized buildings and real property resulting from the closure or realignment of military installations are made available to assist the homeless.
